name: Study for a masked portrait, Wendy Song, 2021
description: Mask wearing has transformed our perception of the other. This portrait is from Wendy Song, an actress. She sat for my robots in Hong-Kong during the Human Study #1/ArtUnchained solo show at Artistree last November. This portrait is produced with a mixture of processes: neural net based image transform using a model train with masked sitters who sat for my robots in Dubai and Hong Kong and a generative system similar to the one controlling my robots' behaviours. @patricktresset
